resources.string: Warning! Changing storage method will make all the data stored elsewhere unavailable!
Loading data points from storage.. If you press back, you will not get to use the data points in computations!
Saving data points in memory to storage..
WiFi is disabled. Please enable it in settings.
GPS is disabled. Please enable it in settings.
GPS fix attained. Waiting for target accuracy..
Once the GPS gets a fix. The maps will focus onto your area.

This is just an early alpha with a lot of bugs and inefficient algorithms, but it will get better over time, promise :-) Ill have to test if scrolling works.. Ill have to test if scrolling works..
